author: pipermerriam
content:
A task that I think would be valuable for someone other than me to take on:  

Fill in one of the sections under "Network Functionality": https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/blob/master/portal-network.md#network-functionality

Goal would be to write down at a high level all of the things one or more of the individual networks needs to do.  Most of this has already been written down in the 3-part light client blog posts here (https://snakecharmers.ethereum.org/the-winding-road-to-functional-light-clients/) or in the glossary here (https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/wiki/Glossary)

I'm happy to do this work, but I think if any of you want to test/improve your understanding of what we're doing this would be a good way to do that.  Simply opening a PR to that document and then we can collaborate on it there (with me reviewing it and giving suggestions on any missing pieces or whatever)

author: Deleted User
content: I can take one or more

author: pipermerriam
content: Great, I'll keep an eye out for a PR, feel free to ask questions here too (or in <#688086042959806497> or <#806927594092101642> )
